name: GrapeSplosion!
description:
In this short platformer your goal is to get to the hospital without eating too much!

If you run out of space in your stomach, then eating will cause you to explode!

  • I made this game by myself 
  • My name is ZeRobin - zeplaysgames@gmail.com
  • Game Name - GrapeSplosion
  • I didnt create anything before the Jam
  • For Windows
